Summary: orb rotating in circle in the same spot for a long period of time
divs: Sighting Details1. I was taking a walk and in my neighborhood 2.when I started to look at the stars I notice a light in the sky 3. I thought it was a spotlight there was no light source it could come from 4.it was an orb rotating in a circle in less 4 sec. the orb continued rotating before vanishing. 5. it was a very weird feeling 6.it was rotating then it just vanished.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Jacksonville
There were no other sightings in Jacksonville on or around April 7th 2013
